00028   // Includes
00029   include_once("libError.php");
00030 
00031   class PG_object {
00032     /* Protected vars */
00033     protected $objects_list;    //< This array stores references to the plugin objects.
00034     protected $dir;                                             //< This contains the path to the plugins to load.
00035     protected $eh;                                              //< This points to the error handler.
00036 
00046     function __construct($dir) {
00047       // Setup the error handler
00048       $this->eh=ER_Handler::getInstance();
00049 
00050       // Load the plugins
00051       if(!isset($dir)){
00052               $this->eh->logCrit("PG_object constructor", "Missing plugins directory name", "Instanciate this object with the good parameters !");
00053         return false;
00054       }
00055                         if(!is_dir($dir)){
00056                                 $this->eh->logCrit("PG_object constructor", "Wrong plugins directory name", "Instanciate this object with the name of a directory that exists !");
00057         return false;
00058                         }
00059       $this->dir=$dir;
00060       $handle=opendir($this->dir);
00061       if ($handle==false) {
00062         $this->eh->logCrit("PG_object constructor", "Unable to open the plugins directory", "Check that you have the read permissions on '$this->dir'");
00063                                 return false;
00064       }
00065       while(($candidate=readdir($handle))!=false){
00066         $candidate_dir=$dir."/".$candidate;
00067         if (!ereg('^\.', $candidate) && is_dir($candidate_dir)){
00068           $init_file=$candidate_dir."/init.php";
00069           if(file_exists($init_file)){
00070             // Include the plugin file. This one sets the '$PG_current_class'
00071                                 // to the name of the class to use to instanciate the plugin
00072                                     // object.
00073             include($init_file);
00074             // Get the class name from '$PG_current_class', then
00075                                                 // instanciate it. Store the object in the right namespace of
00076                                                 // the '$object_list' array.
00077                                                 // If the '$PG_current_class' variable is empty or unset,
00078                                     // display an error, ignore the current plugin and jump to
00079                                     // the next.
00080                                     $plugin_name=$candidate;
00081                                     if (empty($PG_current_class)){
00082                                       $this->eh->logCrit("PG_object constructor", "\$PG_current_class not set in the '$candidate' plugin, it will be ignored.", "Blame this plugin's author !");
00083                                   break;
00084                                     }
00085                                     // If the requested class does not exists, ignore the current
00086                                 // plugin, display an error and jump to the next
00087                                     if (!class_exists($PG_current_class)){
00088                                   $this->eh->logCrit("PG_object constructor", "The '$PG_current_class' class does not exists in the '$candidate' plugin, it will be ignored.", "Blame this plugin's author !");
00089                         break;
00090                                     }
00091             $this->objects_list[$plugin_name]=new $PG_current_class($plugin_name);
00092                                     /* Never too cautious : */
00093                                     unset ($PG_current_class);
00094           }
00095           else{
00096             $this->eh->logCrit("PG_object constructor", "'$init_file' not found, '$candidate' plugin ignored.", "Blame this plugin's author !");
00097                                   }
00098         }
00099         else{
00100           $this->eh->logDebug("PG_object constructor", "Ignore '$candidate_dir'.", "This is not a plugin directory, no error here.");
00101         }
00102       }
00103     } // End of constructor
00104  
00105     function runAllPluginsFunc($function, $args=array()) {
00106       // Run the specified function of all plugins of this object.
00107       if (empty($function)){
00108                                 $this->eh->logCrit("runAllPluginFunc()", "Missing function to call", "Specify a function to call for all plugins");
00109         return false;
00110       }
00111 
00112       $return = '';
00113 
00114       if (is_array($this->objects_list)){
00115         foreach (array_keys($this->objects_list) as $plugin_name){
00116           $return.=$this->runPluginFunc($plugin_name, $function, $args);
00117         }
00118       }
00119       return $return;
00120     }
00121 
00122     function runPluginFunc($plugin, $function, $args=array()) {
00123       // Run the specified function of a given plugin.
00124       if (empty($plugin)||empty($function)){
00125                                 $this->eh->logCrit("runPluginFunc()", "Missing plugin or function", "Specify the plugin AND the function to call in it");
00126         return false;
00127       }
00128       $return = '';
00129       //$plugin_to_call=$this->objects_list["$plugin"];
00130 
00131       if (isset($this->objects_list["$plugin"]) && is_object($this->objects_list["$plugin"])){
00132         $plugin_to_call=$this->objects_list["$plugin"];
00133         if (method_exists ($plugin_to_call, $function)){
00134           $return = call_user_func_array(array($plugin_to_call,$function), $args);
00135         }
00136         else {
00137                                   $this->eh->logCrit("runPluginFunc()", "Function '$function' not found in '$plugin'", "Specify a function that exists in the '$plugin' plugin");
00138                                 return false;
00139                                 }
00140       }
00141       else {
00142         $this->eh->logCrit("runPluginFunc()", "Plugin '$plugin' not found", "Specify a plugin that exists !");
00143                                 return false;
00144       }
00145         return $return;
00146     }
00147 
00148     function listPlugins() {
00149       if (is_array($this->objects_list)){
00150         foreach (array_keys($this->objects_list) as $plugin_name){
00151           $return[]=$plugin_name;
00152         }
00153       return $return;
00154       }
00155     }
00156   } // class PG_object
